name: Puppet Show
description:
In the twisted world of Puppet Show, the player is tasked to explore a circus where things have gone... terrible. The performers have been deprived of their souls and turned into mindless puppets. Can you set them free?

HOW TO PLAY

Move: Arrow keys
Jump: Spacebar
Dash: Z

You can cut the strings by dashing into them. Good luck and have fun!
